data.title: WORST BAR EVER
data.text: This establishment is terrible. While it looks nice on the inside, the staff is rude and not welcoming whatsoever. I had to wait 20 minutes to get a drink because the bartender did not want to come serve me even though there were less than 10 people in the place. When it came time to pay my bill, I had to ask 3 times to get my check and it took more than 25 minutes to pay. I will NEVER come back here. EVER. Don't go here, it is a waste of your time and money.
